oai_dc:dc.dc:descriptions: Notes on |auni, Vol.1, made at Frankenwald Research Station, Witwatersrand University. Words and sentences and much personal history. Also some fragmented information about artefacts, ornaments and daily life, markings (cuts made for hunting and the cutting of girls for example).
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Dorothea Bleek
Book BC151_A3_029
